title: Google Cloud Platform (GCP) Mastery
description: Gain expertise in Google Cloud Platform (GCP) services and tools to architect, deploy, and manage cloud solutions. This course covers foundational concepts, hands-on labs, and advanced GCP services to prepare you for cloud-based roles in modern enterprises.
about: This comprehensive GCP course is designed to build expertise in cloud computing with Google Cloud Platform. From foundational knowledge to advanced services like machine learning and DevOps tools, this course provides the skills needed to manage scalable cloud solutions.

highlights.name: GCP Fundamentals
highlights.description: Understand the core concepts and architecture of Google Cloud.

highlights.name: Compute and Storage Services
highlights.description: Master GCPâ€™s virtual machines, storage options, and databases.

highlights.name: Networking and Security
highlights.description: Learn to design secure and scalable networks on GCP.

highlights.name: Serverless and Big Data
highlights.description: Explore serverless solutions and GCP's data processing tools.

highlights.name: Cloud Automation
highlights.description: Automate and optimize deployments with DevOps tools.

roles.title: Cloud Engineer
roles.description: Specialize in designing and deploying cloud solutions using GCP.

roles.title: Cloud Architect
roles.description: Plan and implement scalable architectures on Google Cloud.

roles.title: DevOps Engineer
roles.description: Streamline operations with CI/CD pipelines on GCP.

roles.title: Data Engineer
roles.description: Develop and maintain data processing systems using GCP services.

faq.question: What is the duration of the GCP Mastery course?
faq.answer: The course spans three months with flexible scheduling.

faq.question: Will I receive a certificate upon completion of the course?
faq.answer: Yes, a certificate will be provided upon successful completion.

faq.question: Do I need prior experience in cloud computing?
faq.answer: No prior experience is required. The course is suitable for all levels.

faq.question: Does the course prepare me for GCP certification exams?
faq.answer: Yes, the course aligns with GCP certification tracks, including Associate Cloud Engineer and Professional Cloud Architect.

faq.question: Will the course include hands-on labs?
faq.answer: Yes, you will gain practical experience through hands-on labs and projects.

description: Overview of cloud computing and GCP
Setting up a Google Cloud account
Navigating the GCP console and CLI
Understanding core GCP services and architecture
Managing projects, billing, and permissions
Creating and organizing resources with GCP IAM
Using the Cloud Shell for quick access

chapters.module: Module 3: Compute Engine and App Engine
description: Launching and managing virtual machines
Scaling applications with App Engine
Understanding Kubernetes Engine (GKE)
Working with Cloud Storage
Using relational databases with Cloud SQL
Exploring NoSQL options with Firestore and Bigtable
Designing virtual networks and subnets
Setting up load balancers and auto-scaling groups
Using Cloud CDN for content delivery
Implementing identity and access management
Securing data with encryption
Using Security Command Center for monitoring
Analyzing data with BigQuery
Processing data pipelines with Dataflow
Streaming data with Pub/Sub
Using AI tools like Vision API and Natural Language API
Training custom models with Vertex AI
Deploying ML models with AI Platform
Building pipelines with Cloud Build
Deploying containers to GKE and Cloud Run
Using Terraform for infrastructure as code
Monitoring resources with Cloud Monitoring
Optimizing costs with tools like Recommender
Troubleshooting with Cloud Debugger and Trace
